description: This is a Dart source file defining a GoalProvider class, which manages goal data, fetches goals from an API, notifies listeners, and handles loading/error states in a Flutter application.

classes.name: GoalProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages fetching and storing goal data, including loading and error states.

methods.name: fetchGoals
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches goal data from the API, updates the internal list of goals, handles loading/error states, and notifies listeners.
